title: Ineos Grenadiers Got Its Mojo Back – But It’s Got a Long Road to ‘Super Team’ Status
content:
'It's a long journey': The dormant powerhouse squad has come out swinging after a full winter reboot, but longer-term issues remain in its quest to catch Pogačar and Visma.

Read the full article at Ineos Grenadiers Got Its Mojo Back – But It’s Got a Long Road to ‘Super Team’ Status on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
